cause.description:
In the recent months of summer many things have happened... Matt Nix has no job. His father is disabled and cannot make a living and is on hurt leave from his job. All we ask for is a simple dollar. JUST A DOLLAR! And the money we gain through this orginization we will give it to his family. Thank you kind people oh so much!
1. Matt Nix must eat.
2. He has been hungry for many days now.
3. I know you all will help.
cause.mission: bring money that the kind people of facebook donate to feed me.
cause.name: Matt Nix is Broke as a Joke!
